FuncDef: This command controls the interval between transmit opportunities that are applied to the Applicant state machine. An instance of this Join Period Timer is required on a per-Port, per-MRP Participant basis. For additional information, refer to IEEE 802.1ak-2007 section 10.7.4.1.

ParaDef.Info: The interval between transmit opportunities, in tenths of a second. Values-1 to 10.
